turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a grande Caramel Cloud Macchiato

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which location would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am near the W Broad street lcation

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok I will place your order at the 2331 W. Broad street location, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that is correct

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, I have a Grande Caramel Cloud Macchiato, is there any specifications you would like to add?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would like to request 2% milk and extra whip cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem I can update that for you right now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok I have successfully updated your order. Is there anything else you would like to add to this order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you that was all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, I am submitting your order now, please hold...

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, your order was successfully submitted. Would you like me to email your confirmation number to the email on file?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that would be great. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright let me confirm your email address, I have kbeezy1@gmail.com, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright I have sent you the confirmation email as well as the users bar-code to scan for easy pick up once you arrive at the location.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It was my pleasure, Have a great day and thank you for using Order Easy.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You too.
